stories.title: Rain washes out second ODI
stories.subTitle: Sri Lanka v England, 2nd ODI, Colombo
stories.summary: The second ODI between Sri Lanka and England was called off at 6.05pm local time without a ball being bowled due to heavy rain
stories.byline: The Wisden Bulletin by Martin Williamson

1.title: 1st ODI
1.statusText: Sri Lanka won by 10 wickets (with 217 balls remaining)
